column4: hey, does anyone know how to get a briged connection in vmware with ubuntu as the guest?
The bridge is hooked up on the client side
yes, i'm getting "VMnet0 is not running"
somebody told me you need xp pro
The bridge is probably bridged to the wrong connection or something
Ubuntu runs fine in a VM (usually) --- why are you bridging the connection to begin with?
no idea really, tried googling and there was talk of editting .inf fils and etc
Yeah... dunno, that's a windows thing
NAT works fine... I can't see Windows Network with NAT though (right?)
I also wanted to do the samba thing
some of them have extensive vmware experience
